title: (x) Arnold sans serif - CG Bernhard Gothic {Tiff}
content:
This looks like bliss/Gill Sans. I remember seeing something like this on the ITC.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121113140im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/arnold_5539.jpg)

author: signs79

comments.content: Looks like Berhard Gothic, but the ascender height is shorter on this sample.
my ’h’ glyph is actually a composit glyph of n and h ehehehe Can’t you see that?
